attributes.action: Allow limited controlled self-build development of eco houses on town fringes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a lot of "green belt" land currently wedged between existing town borders and motorways. As this land could not serve as usable green space, local councils should obtain this under compulsory purchase and sell on serviced plots at agricultural values to local people willing to self build low/neutral carbon homes either as a community or individually. This would create "real" affordable housing with an instant community ethos as well as contributing to the reduction in CO2 emmisions.
